member.name: T:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Power
member.summary: Provides methods to control power mode of the target CPU.
member.remarks: This API is available only for SMT32 targets.

member.name: T:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Power.WakeupPin
member.summary: Wake-up pin enumeration.

member.name: F:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Power.WakeupPin.Pin1
member.summary: Wake-up pin 1.

member.name: F:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Power.WakeupPin.Pin2
member.summary: Wake-up pin 2.

member.name: F:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Power.WakeupPin.Pin3
member.summary: Wake-up pin 3.

member.name: T:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Power.WakeupReasonType
member.summary: Wakeup reason enumeration.

member.name: F:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Power.WakeupReasonType.Undetermined
member.summary: Undetermined wakeup reason.

member.name: F:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Power.WakeupReasonType.FromStandby
member.summary: Wakeup from standby mode.

member.name: F:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Power.WakeupReasonType.FromPin
member.summary: Wakeup from pin.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Power.EnterStandbyMode
member.summary: Sets the target device to enter STM32 "standby" mode.
member.remarks: If no wakeup sources configured then it will be a indefinite sleep. This call never returns. After the device enters standby a wakeup source will wake the device and the execution will start as if it was a reset. Keep in mind that the execution WILL NOT continue after the call to this method.

member.name: P:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Power.WakeupReason
member.summary: Gets the reason for device wakeup.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Power.DisableWakeupPin(nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Power.WakeupPin)
member.summary: Disables the specified as wake-up source.
member.remarks: The wake-up pin availability is target dependent. Check the target device data-sheet for details. If the specified pin is not available an is thrown.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Power.EnableWakeupPin(nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Power.WakeupPin)
member.summary: Enables the specified as wake-up source.
member.remarks: The wake-up pin availability is target dependent. Check the target device data-sheet for details. If the specified pin is not available an is thrown.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Power.NativeEnterStandbyMode
member.summary: Sets the target device to enter STM32 "standby" mode.

member.name: T:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.RTC
member.summary: Provides access to RTC (real time clock) features.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.RTC.SetAlarm(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Sets the for the alarm. This will wake-up the target device if it's in sleep or power down mode.
member.param: Time to set.
member.remarks: If target device has more than one alarm. This will set Alarm A.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.RTC.GetAlarm
member.summary: Gets the set for the alarm.
member.returns: Return the current set for the alarm.
member.remarks: If target device has more than one alarm. This is the value of Alarm A.

member.name: T:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Utilities
member.summary: Utilities for managing and handling STM32 target devices.

member.name: P:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Utilities.UniqueDeviceId
member.summary: Gets the 96 bits unique device ID.

member.name: P:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Utilities.DeviceId
member.summary: Gets the device identifier.

member.name: P:nanoFramework.Hardware.Stm32.Utilities.DeviceRevisionId
member.summary: Gets the device revision identifier.
